predicate.note: Frames file for 'decree' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: to issue or demand by decree

example.name: transitive
example.text: ( Within her garden , she has decreed a waterfall , a rill , ponds and other costly , trivial waterworks beside the Hudson . )
example.arg: a waterfall , a rill , ponds and other costly , trivial waterworks
